import React from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PriceChart=_ref=>{let{data=[],ticker='AAPL'}=_ref;// Generate mock data if none provided
